KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. attributes.title: 2019 Kia Rio 1.4 Tec 5-dr

attributes.description:
Ford Fiesta 2000 - on Fiesta 1.0 Ecoboost Titanium 5dr
Stunning, sporty 2019 Fiesta in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, aircon, airbag, radio with bluetooth. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Keyless ignition. Manual transmission and gives a smooth drive. Very reliable for getting you to all your destinations. Rear sensors to assist with parking. Electric mirrors and windows. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this beauty for a test drive. Nationwide delivery.
